Product Name: Samsung 108 cm (43 inches) Full HD Smart LED TV UA43T5450AKXXL (Black)
Title: Decent Smart TV, But Sound and Color Could Be Better
Reviews: The Samsung 32-inch has a sleek design and decent smart features, making it a good choice for basic entertainment needs. The interface is smooth, and apps run without lag. However, the sound quality is not very impressive, it lacks depth and feels a bit low even at higher volumes. The color output also seems slightly off, with some shades appearing dull or oversaturated. While it’s a budget-friendly option with Samsung’s reliability, those looking for vibrant picture quality and rich sound might need to consider additional speakers or a higher-end model.

Product Name: Samsung 108 cm (43 inches) Full HD Smart LED TV UA43T5450AKXXL (Black)
Title: Value for money
Reviews: Budget friendly samsung trust , excellent service technician, wall mount bracket or tv stand free with the product but separately at the time of installation. Good picture quality- true color, u can raise brightness by dynamic option in settings, smooth functions, very good sound. Value for money if bought 12k. Insurance is only valid if bought with tv. If u want can purchase separately but outside Ama zon or flip k a rt

Product Name: Samsung 108 cm (43 inches) Full HD Smart LED TV UA43T5450AKXXL (Black)
Title: Old model, with 2 star energy consumption rating. And its app store doesn't have much apps.
Reviews: If we talk about talk about hardware. It's a great product. But when it's comes to software, specs and electricity consumption it's totally different thing. First of all it's not a android tv. It's smart TV. They both are totally different things. In smart tv it has its own app store which has limited amount of apps to install. And there is no way to install third party apps. Worst part is it's store doesn't even have basic android tv apps. Second it's a 5 years old model so interface is a old samsung operating system. Which looks really outdated. It's energy consumption rating is 2star which is again really outdated, means it consumes more electricity. I'm giving it 2 star because seller tried to hide these things by not mentioning it in description. Overall pretty decent picture quality.
